pageProps.rawText: When people come to my personal site, they often ask: what are some of the features it offers? The two main parts are my blog and my projects.Under my blog one can find out about my opinions and interests through short and digestible blog posts. These blog posts are great to read, and share on social media. Through my projects, one can find out what I am working on and even try the projects. These live and interactive demos give a more full experience of what I am currently doing. My site also has many easter eggs hidden about it. The only way to find these easter eggs is to use it or to look at the source code on github. There is one secret I will give you now about my site for free: it has custom keyboard shortcuts. For example, shift+h takes one home, shift+b takes one to my blog, and shift+p takes one to my projects.

article.title: The features of my site
article.file:
When people come to my personal site, they often ask: what are some of the features it offers? The two main parts are my blog and my projects.

Under my blog one can find out about my opinions and interests through short and digestible blog posts. These blog posts are great to read, and share on social media.

Through my projects, one can find out what I am working on and even try the projects. These live and interactive demos give a more full experience of what I am currently doing.

My site also has many easter eggs hidden about it. The only way to find these easter eggs is to use it or to look at the source code on github. There is one secret I will give you now about my site for free: it has custom keyboard shortcuts. For example, shift+h takes one home, shift+b takes one to my blog, and shift+p takes one to my projects.
